X.T: YUI Theater — Ross Harmes: “Porting Flickr to YUI 3″ (36 min.)

ARTICLE.COMMENT:
A very informative description of the problems encountered by Flickr when they revamped their site with YUI3: application not usable until the whole JS is loaded, long URLs truncated by firewalls, idem with URLs containing "XXX", event polling using too much CPU, and performance measurements. The slides are available herehttp://lanyrd.com/2010/yuiconf/spdm/
enFlash.
